resources.string: Chill Chat is a social communication application that connects random people into group chats where they have the option to skip groups until they find one that interests them. Users can decide whether they want to stay anonymous or create an account.

Below are the instructions for how to use Chill Chat: 
 1) To send a message click on the text box on the chat screen, type, and then press send. 
 2) To go to a new group, press the two arrows in the top right. 
 3) To navigate around the application, use the menu in the top left and click on desired option. 
 4) To view a users profile, click on their message on the chat screen. 
 5) To change your profile information, go to the profile and fill in the text boxes, then click the pencil icon. 
 6) To change your profile picture, go to the profile and click on the image. Select a photo smaller than 1MB, then click on the pencil icon.
Brian Chan, Christine Au-yeung, Michael Tran, \n Ryan Polkiewicz, Sathusan Kandasamy
